isis.stitle: TSI 92-12-10 - Release of 1992-1993 Model Year 7.3 Liter Diesel Engines

subjectgroup.subject: Release of 1992-1993 Model Year 7.3 Liter Diesel Engines

lev1.title: General
lev1.para: Two new 7.3 Liter diesel Engines, having the following horsepower ratings are released for 1992-1993 Model Year:

item.para: Model A155 (155 BHP @ 3000 RPM) Diesel Engine
Model A170 (170 BHP @ 3000 RPM) Diesel Engine

lev1.para: The following new components are also released to accommodate the new 1992-1993 Model Year engine emission level requirements:

lev1.title: FUEL INJECTION PUMPS
lev1.para: Two new fuel injection pumps, calibrated to achieve required exhaust emissions, are released for 1992-1993 Model Year, displacing 1991 Model Year fuel injection pumps. Refer to Table 1 for latest pump part numbers.
Calibration data regarding these 1992-1993 Model Year fuel injection pumps are also released herein.

note.para: Use only the specified fuel injection pump to achieve certified exhaust emissions for the engine rating. Injection pump identification is made by the International® part number located on the name plate. Refer to Figure 1.

figure.caption: Figure 1. Fuel Injection Pump Identification Location

lev1.para: Calibration Charts ( Table 2 and Table 3) for 1992-1993 Model Year Fuel Injection Pumps, part numbers 1 813 460 C93 and 1 813 465 C93.

table.title: Fuel Injection Pump P/N 1 813 460 C93 for Model A170 (170 BHP @ 3000 RPM)

entry.para: Throttle Travel From LI to WOT to be 62° ± 5°
*May be reset using low idle screw.
**1.75° ± 1° less than reading obtained in Check Point "A".
***1.87° ± .62° greater than reading obtained in Check Point "I"

table.title: Fuel Injection Pump P/N 1 813 465 C93 for Model A155 (155 BHP @ 3000 RPM)

entry.para: Throttle Travel From LI to WOT to be 62° ± 5°
*May be reset using low idle screw.
**1.75° ± 1° less than reading obtained in Check Point "A".
***1.87° ± .62° greater than reading obtained in Check Point "I".

important.para: Be sure to file a copy of these updated specifications in your copy of CGES-475 "Stanadyne Model DB2 Fuel Injection Pump Service Manual," dated March 1988.

lev1.title: INJECTION NOZZLE AND HOLDER ASSEMBLY
lev1.para: New Injector Nozzle and Holder Assembly, P/N 1 816 605 C91 (Code Mark "E") is released for both 1992-1993 Model Year 7.3 Liter Diesel Engines. Refer to Figure 2 for "Code Mark" and "Part Number" locations

important.para: Do NOT intermix injection nozzle assemblies! Intermixing nozzles between engine model years will result in poor performance and non-compliance with emission standards.

figure.caption: Figure 2. Code Mark and Part Number Location

lev1.title: PISTONS
lev1.para: 1992-1993 Model Year pistons feature a new piston skirt profile and a reduced running clearance. Refer to Table 4.
A slight difference exists between 1992-1993 Model Year and 1991 Model Year pistons making it almost impossible to distinguish between the two.
Correct piston can be identified by the production part number located on top of piston. Refer to Figure 3and Table 4 below

figure.caption: Figure 3. Piston Production Part Number Location

entry.para: Fuel Injection Pump (for use on Model A155 [155 BHP @ 3000 RPM])
Fuel Injection Pump (for use on Model A170 [170 BHP @ 3000 RPM])
Injector Nozzle and Holder Assembly (Code Mark "E")
Piston and Ring Service Package (Std.) (Consists of PISTON RING (Std) SERVICE PACKAGE, 1 813 171 C91 and PISTON & PIN (Std.) SERVICE PACKAGE (Not furnished separately)
Piston and Ring Service Package (.010 O/S) (Consists of PISTON RING (.010 O/S) SERVICE PACKAGE, 1 813 172 C91 and PISTON & PIN (.010 O/S) SERVICE PACKAGE (not furnished separately)
Piston and Ring Service Package (.020 O/S) (Consists of PISTON RING (.020 O/S) SERVICE PACKAGE , 1 813 173 C91 and PISTON & PIN (.020 O/S) SERVICE PACKAGE (not furnished separately)
Piston and Ring Service Package (.030 O/S) (Consists of PISTON RING (.030 O/S) SERVICE PACKAGE, 1 813 174 C91 and PISTON & PIN (.030 0/S) SERVICE PACKAGE (not furnished separately)
*Use displaced stock on engines built prior to 1992-1993 Model Year until exhausted, then furnish new for all orders.
**Furnish new or old as ordered until old is exhausted, then furnish new.
